column7: Individual research, independent study, special problems, thesis, development and/or design work under the direction of the instructor/Honors advisor. May be repeated in the same or subsequent semesters to a maximum of 12 hours. No more than 12 hrs may be counted towards degree. Prerequisite: Junior standing, admission to the ACES Honors Program, consent of instructor. Restricted to students majoring in MFST.
